alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Putnam; Smith; Trousdale; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 2:24AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Smith, northwestern De Kalb, eastern Wilson, southwestern Trousdale and west central Putnam Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 224 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Watertown, or 10 miles west of Carthage, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Carthage, Watertown, Gordonsville, Hickman, South Carthage, Alexandria, Dowelltown, Liberty, Center Hill Lake, Tuckers Crossroads and Dickerson Chapel Recreation Area. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 235 and 270. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: De Kalb; Putnam; Smith; Trousdale; Wilson
